thread.title: Man accused of paralyzing teen boy who tried to rob him during drug deal
thread.title_full: Man accused of paralyzing teen boy who tried to rob him during drug deal

author: William Lee
title: Man accused of paralyzing teen boy who tried to rob him during drug deal
text:
Man accused of paralyzing teen boy who tried to rob him during drug deal Johnathan Ramos, 22 Police photo 
Johnathan Ramos, 22, is accused of shooting and paralyzing a 15-year-old boy who police said tried to rob him during a drug deal. 
Johnathan Ramos, 22, is accused of shooting and paralyzing a 15-year-old boy who police said tried to rob him during a drug deal. (Police photo)
